hero.title: Next Generation Data Privacy
hero.content: <paragraph>The HOPR protocol is built for everyone. Our mission of introducing network-level data privacy for all industries and individuals starts with you.<breakLine></breakLine><breakLine></breakLine>In becoming our valued partner, we provide you with:</paragraph>
hero.list: <list><child>Your personal project manager</child><child>A dedicated engineer for the integration of the HOPR protocol</child><child>Membership in the HOPR Association</child></list>
